mention.text: `` Russian journalists released , flown from Kiev to Russia Two Russian journalists working for LifeNews agency , detained by Kiev forces for almost a week
The plane carrying them set a course from Kiev for Grozny !
Kiev authorities , who refused to share any details of their whereabouts and denied a special observation mission to visit the detained Russian journalists
The accusations of illegally transporting weapons and aiding terrorism against Russian journalists
Journalists that called on Kiev authorities to stop equating conflict reporting with terrorism
his Italian colleague and his interpreter
